name: PickList
description: PickList is used to reorder items between different lists.

selection.label: selection
selection.title: Selected items in the list as a multidimensional array.

data-key.label: dataKey
data-key.title: Name of the field that uniquely identifies the a record in the data.

meta-key-selection.label: metaKeySelection
meta-key-selection.title:
Defines whether metaKey is requred or not for the selection.
When true metaKey needs to be pressed to select or unselect an item and
when set to false selection of each item can be toggled individually. On touch enabled devices, metaKeySelection is turned off automatically.

auto-option-focus.label: autoOptionFocus
auto-option-focus.title: Whether to focus on the first visible or selected element.

focus-on-hover.label: focusOnHover
focus-on-hover.title: When enabled, the focus is placed on the hovered option.

list-style.label: listStyle
list-style.title: Inline style of the the list element.

responsive.label: responsive
responsive.title: Whether the list optimizes layout based on screen size.

breakpoint.label: breakpoint
breakpoint.title: The breakpoint to define the maximum width boundary when responsiveness is enabled.

striped-rows.label: stripedRows
striped-rows.title: Whether to displays rows with alternating colors.

show-source-controls.label: showSourceControls
show-source-controls.title: Whether to show buttons of source list.

show-target-controls.label: showTargetControls
show-target-controls.title: Whether to show buttons of target list.

tabindex.label: tabindex
tabindex.title: Index of the list element in tabbing order.

target-list-props.label: targetListProps
target-list-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLAttributes to the target list element.

source-list-props.label: sourceListProps
source-list-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLAttributes to the source list element.

move-up-button-props.label: moveUpButtonProps
move-up-button-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the move up button inside the component.

move-top-button-props.label: moveTopButtonProps
move-top-button-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the move top button inside the component.

move-down-button-props.label: moveDownButtonProps
move-down-button-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the move down button inside the component.

move-bottom-button-props.label: moveBottomButtonProps
move-bottom-button-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the move bottom button inside the component.

move-to-target-props.label: moveToTargetProps
move-to-target-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the move to target button inside the component.

move-all-to-target-props.label: moveAllToTargetProps
move-all-to-target-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the move all to target button inside the component.

move-to-source-props.label: moveToSourceProps
move-to-source-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the move to source button inside the component.

move-all-to-source-props.label: moveAllToSourceProps
move-all-to-source-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the move all to source button inside the component.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

pt-options.label: ptOptions
pt-options.title: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: movetotargeticon
slots.title: Custom move to target icon template.

slots.name: movealltotargeticon
slots.title: Custom move all to target icon template.

slots.name: movetosourceicon
slots.title: Custom move to source icon template.

slots.name: movealltosourceicon
slots.title: Custom move all to source icon template.
